alert.note: Alert for Bell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 28 at 4:02PM CDT until April 28 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CORYELL AND BELL COUNTIES... At 401 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Temple, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Killeen, Temple, Copperas Cove, Harker Heights, Belton, Fort Hood, Nolanville, Morgan`s Point Resort, Salado, Little River-Academy, Troy, Belton Lake, Stillhouse Hollow Lake, Union Grove, Ding Dong, White Hall, Maxdale, Cedar Valley, Moffat and Owl Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for central Texas.
